casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joseph L. ROBINSON. No. 68P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Joseph L. Robinson, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th day of January 2005 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Buncombe County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
